flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I needed a quick and easy pole photography rig that I could operate on my own without complicated electronics.

This version uses an IR remote, wired trigger or intervelometer to trigger the pictures. You won't have the control over the photos that the remote controlled rig gives, but with a little planning you can create some interesting pictures.

Most of the parts can be found at most hardware/home improvement stores. The exception is the camera and triggering mechanism.
